name: Goomanuvr
description:
Goomanuvr is the silliest platformer about goo buddies tethered up trying to jump through life.
We wanted to capture the hilariousness of working with a teammate (or you can fly solo) trying to get through various obstacles to get to your goal!



  • Discover what it means to be a Goo.
  • Limited or infinite mode.
  • Simple to learn, hard to master
  • Controller is HIGHLY Recommended
  • Goo!
